Name: Totally Ratical Adventures
About the game: Play as Pastel - a Cute Rat on a mission to save their friends! Classic Fun and Fast 3D Platforming with lots of stuff to collect! 8 Colorful worlds to explore! A Hubworld and a Final boss battle! 24 mice to rescue! Discover hidden Items and Secret Challenges Find hidden secrets and uncover a dark mystery...
